title: Crochet Braids
description: To achieve this style, your hair will first be braided into cornrows to minimize volume. Pre-styled extensions as twists, braids, curls, or waves will next be attached via a crochet needle.
extensions:
We provide and prepare the hair for you. We use brands you love, like Freetress and Kima Ocean Wave. Just select the style and color of your hair extensions during booking. 

No need for beauty supply runs!
